Articles.Content:
Canberra Cockpits are a safe alternative to the stock cockpits in game. All cockpits include an ejection seat and cupholders! So far we have two products for your needs.

**Mark-X Cockpit**

![c9uYT2v.png](http://i.imgur.com/c9uYT2v.png)

[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/98uwxkpbophl95m/MK-X%20Cockpit.craft?dl=0)

**Canberra Mk-I Cockpit**

![Ivym73l.png](http://i.imgur.com/Ivym73l.png)

[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/inqnl2upyq08roz/Canberra%20MK-I%20Cockpit.craft?dl=0)

Wow, such a great use of aesthetics!

And.. **ejector seats?!**Ã¢â‚¬â€¹ Holy Kraken, this must've been hard to engineer!

I think that you *may* have made a double post...

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/127490-Mark-X-Cockpit](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/127490-Mark-X-Cockpit)

Oh, never mind, sorry. My bad ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-03T08:40:04Z" title="07/03/2015 08:40  AM" data-short="9 yr">July 3, 2015</time> by NeatCrown**

Nice

Now I can't help but post this:

![rFI6kpb.png](http://i.imgur.com/rFI6kpb.png)

![QZRj2Ik.png](http://i.imgur.com/QZRj2Ik.png)

Polyurethane ejection seat with plushy headrest, armrests, LCD multifunction display with softkey buttons, HUD, blah blah

![6ZNlaqKh.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/6ZNlaqKh.jpg)

How bad are these regarding drag? I'd imagine you would need a CoL quite a ways behind CoM to keep one of these open-cockpit birds flying straight...

Rune. But hey, they do look cool.

They don't actually create ridiculous amounts of drag as you'd expect. I messed with zekes MiG-31 and it had no performance impact whatsoever

![0eEN3Ru.png](http://i.imgur.com/0eEN3Ru.png)
